title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

title: Paths of Glory
description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: The Seventh Seal
description: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: Wild Strawberries
description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: Nights of Cabiria
description: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

title: Sweet Smell of Success
description: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

title: Throne of Blood
description: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

title: A Face in the Crowd
description: An Arkansas drifter becomes an overnight media sensation. As he becomes drunk with fame and power, he will betray the people who made him a star.

title: The Cranes Are Flying
description: Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only to find he has volunteered for the war.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
description: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw leader until the train to Yuma arrives, but the outlaw's gang has other ideas.

title: The Incredible Shrinking Man
description: When Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
description: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

title: An Affair to Remember
description: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

title: Funny Face
description: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

title: Jailhouse Rock
description: After serving time for manslaughter, young Vince Everett becomes a teenage rock star.

title: The Three Faces of Eve
description: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder who has three distinct personalities.

title: Sayonara
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A US Air Force Major in Kobe, Japan falls in love with a Japanese dancer, despite the US military's strong opposition to interracial marriages.

title: Peyton Place
description: The darker side of a small New England town is revealed in this film based on the sensational best-seller.

title: Old Yeller
description: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away driving cattle.

title: Night of the Demon
description: American psychologist John Holden arrives in London for a conference, where he is plunged into a nightmare of witchcraft and murder.

title: Pyaasa
description: A struggling poet attempts to establish himself in a society that is indifferent to his work, while finding solace with a prostitute.

title: Mother India
description: A poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations, but no matter the struggles, always sticks to her own moral code.

title: Kanal
description: During the 1944 Warsaw Uprising, a company of Home Army resistance soldiers try to escape the Nazis by going through the sewers.

title: The Enemy Below
description: During World War II, an American destroyer meets a German U-Boat, and the two captains engage in a deadly game of cat and mouse.

title: White Nights
description: A lonely man meets a woman who is waiting for her lover, and they develop a deep connection over several nights.

title: Desk Set
description: Two extremely strong personalities clash over the computerization of a television network's research department.

title: A King in New York
description: A deposed European monarch seeks refuge in New York City, where he becomes an accidental television celebrity.

title: Love in the Afternoon
description: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him.

title: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
description: A marine and a nun form an unlikely friendship when they are stranded on a Pacific island during World War II.

title: The Tin Star
description: An experienced bounty hunter attempts to help a young sheriff who is having trouble performing his duties.

title: The Curse of Frankenstein
description: Victor Frankenstein builds a creature and brings it to life, but his creation behaves like a monster.

title: Pal Joey
description: A charming, womanizing nightclub singer woos a wealthy widow to finance his own club, but falls for a young chorus girl.

title: Silk Stockings
description: A stern Soviet woman is sent to Paris to retrieve three wayward commissars, but finds herself charmed by the capitalist lifestyle.

title: Les Girls
description: A memoir by one of three former showgirls leads to a libel suit and conflicting flashbacks about their time with a dance troupe.

title: Designing Woman
description: A sportswriter and a fashion designer marry after a brief romance, only to find their lifestyles clashing comically.

title: Man of a Thousand Faces
description: The life story of Lon Chaney, the famous silent film actor known for his transformative makeup and characterizations.

title: The Bachelor Party
description: A group of bachelor friends throw a party for their soon-to-be-married buddy, leading to a night of revelation and melancholy.

title: A Hatful of Rain
description: A Korean War veteran struggles with a secret morphine addiction that threatens to destroy his family life.

title: The Spirit of St. Louis
description: Charles Lindbergh struggles to finance and design an airplane that will fly from New York to Paris.

title: Forty Guns
description: A powerful woman who controls a small Arizona town with her gang of forty hired guns meets a U.S. Marshal who has come to arrest one of her men.

title: The Prince and the Showgirl
description: An American showgirl becomes entangled in political intrigue when the Prince Regent of a foreign country attempts to seduce her.

title: Raintree County
description: A teacher in 1859 Indiana falls in love with a beautiful Southern belle, but the Civil War disrupts their lives.

title: 20 Million Miles to Earth
description: The first spaceship to Venus crashes in the Mediterranean, releasing a monster that grows rapidly and threatens Rome.

title: Will Success Spoil Rock Hunter?
description: A mild-mannered advertising writer tries to get a famous movie star to endorse a lipstick campaign.

title: Fear Strikes Out
description: The true story of baseball player Jimmy Piersall, who battles mental illness and the pressure of his father's expectations.

title: The Tall T
description: A rancher and a pair of newlyweds are held hostage by three outlaws at a lonely stagecoach station.

title: Quatermass 2
description: Professor Quatermass discovers a secret British government facility that is actually a colony for alien invaders.

title: The Abominable Snowman
description: A British scientist joins an American expedition in the Himalayas to search for the legendary Yeti.

title: The Lower Depths
description: In a run-down tenement in Edo-period Japan, a group of impoverished outcasts struggle to survive and find hope.

title: Abandon Ship
description: After a luxury liner sinks, the officer in charge of an overloaded lifeboat must make agonizing decisions about who stays and who is cast adrift.

title: Hell Drivers
description: An ex-con takes a job driving a ballast truck, but finds the company demands reckless speed and competition among drivers.

title: Decision at Sundown
description: A vengeful gunman arrives in the town of Sundown to kill the man he believes seduced his wife years ago.

title: The Pajama Game
description: An employee representative at a pajama factory falls in love with a superintendent, complicating labor negotiations.

title: Zero Hour!
description: When the pilots of an airliner succumb to food poisoning, a former WWII pilot with PTSD must take the controls to save the passengers.

title: Baby Face Nelson
description: A dramatization of the life of Lester M. Gillis, known as Baby Face Nelson, who became one of the most notorious gangsters of the 1930s.

title: The Rising of the Moon
description: Three short stories about Irish life: a man stands up to the police, a train journey goes awry, and a prisoner attempts an escape.

title: Edge of the City
description: A drifter gets a job on the New York waterfront and befriends a black dockworker, but they run afoul of a corrupt union boss.
